Header.featuredDescription: We are with you on the road to success with personalized protocols and the latest technology.

Hero.title: Your Trusted Guide on Your Fertility Journey
Hero.subtitle: We support you and your family in making a new start with advanced technology and personalized treatment methods.

ResourceHub.infertilityDescription: Discover the causes of infertility and the most suitable treatment path for you, step by step.
ResourceHub.ivfDescription: Examine all stages of IVF treatment in detail.
ResourceHub.faqDescription: Find answers to the most curious questions about treatment processes.
ResourceHub.blogDescription: Access the most up-to-date information and our articles on women's health and infertility.

AboutSection.title: More Than a Doctor: A Guide, A Friend
AboutSection.p1: My life journey, which began on the morning of October 10, 1971, in Mersin, led me to a desire to help people and witness their greatest joys. As a mother of two, I feel the indescribable excitement of starting a family and the miracle of every child deep in my heart. This feeling forms the foundation of my passion for my profession and my commitment to my patients.
AboutSection.p2: My medical education, which began at Hacettepe University and was completed with my specialization at Ege University, gave me the opportunity to walk in the light of science. However, I know that medicine is not just about science; it is also about compassion, understanding, and trust.

ServicesSection.title: Our Services
ServicesSection.ivfDescription: Advanced technology and personalized approaches to IVF treatment.
ServicesSection.infertilityDescription: Investigating the causes of infertility and the most effective treatment methods.
ServicesSection.endometriosisDescription: Modern diagnosis and treatment for this chronic condition that can cause pain and infertility.
ServicesSection.pcosDescription: Management and treatment of the most common cause of ovulation problems.

InstagramSection.title: Follow Us on Instagram
InstagramSection.description: Follow <link>@draysinakdogan</link> for the latest information, patient stories, and moments from clinic life.

TestimonialsSection.title: What Our Patients Say
TestimonialsSection.description: The satisfaction and health of our patients are always our priority during the treatment process.

AboutPage.headerTitle: Get to Know Dr. Ayşin Akdoğan
AboutPage.headerDescription: With over 25 years of experience in assisted reproductive technologies, infertility treatment, and women's health, I offer personalized, compassionate, and comprehensive healthcare for every patient in the light of modern medicine.
AboutPage.timelineEge: Ege University Family Planning Research and Application Center
AboutPage.specializationsTitle: Areas of Expertise and Treatment Methods
AboutPage.specializationsDescription: With my extensive experience, I offer comprehensive services in women's health, infertility, and assisted reproductive technologies.
AboutPage.publicationsDescription: I contribute to scientific advancement through internationally recognized publications, book chapters, and clinical research.
AboutPage.internationalDescription: Articles published in prestigious journals such as Fertility & Sterility and the European Journal of Obstetrics & Gynecology.
AboutPage.nationalDescription: Research contributing to the national medical literature in journals such as Turkiye Klinikleri and Ege Tıp Dergisi.
AboutPage.booksDescription: Chapters written for leading textbooks in the field and significant translations.
AboutPage.contactTitle: By Your Side on Your Health Journey
AboutPage.contactDescription: With 25 years of experience and a modern medical approach, I create the most suitable treatment plan for each of my patients and continue to be by your side on this journey.
